name: Project: RE.VE.LA.TION
overview: Project: RE.VE.LA.TION is a clone of Atari's 1979 arcade game Lunar Lander for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum. This game was developed as part of the Lunar Challenge competition organized by Retro Programming Italia. The game was developed by Marco's Retrobits as his entry into the competition, and released on his itch.io page on May 3, 2021.
